name: Atlantic Global
tag_list: online-project-management-software, online-project-management, cloud-computing, work-management, scheduling, project-portfolio-management, project-portfolio-management-software, professional-service-automation, professional-services-automation-software
overview:
Established in 1993, Atlantic Global Plc design, develop and implement collaborative project and resource management solutions for SMB’s through to large corporations.

The Atlantic Global Solution is available in 3 delivery options including software as a service (SaaS), hosted and on-premise implementations. The solution comprises of four modules, each designed to address specific areas of managing a project or service centric businesss.

The Project Management and Collaboration module enables oragnisations to plan projects, manage documents, evaluate risk, track issues and communicate project progress.

The Professional Service Automation module includes time and expense management, project accounting, resource scheduling and advanced contract management & billing functionality.

The Project Portfolio Management module provides the ability to select and prioritise project portfolio’s based on resource demand, planned expenditure, portfolio metrics, planned deliverables and benefits.

The Organisation Planning module enables organisations to model and assess the impact of changing an organisations structure on its planned headcount and project portfolio.

All of the Atlantic Global Solutions modules are 100% web based, are fully integrated and are designed to be used with little or no training.
